Notice Unable to find the system Memopad/Notes App. Share to Copy QR code feature is only available for Android 7.0 and above. Copy This QR code will be copied and automatically pasted in the system Memopad/Notes App. Please back up your updated Account Key after changing the password. Back Up Now
KeyBox Scan Account Key QR code to import Account Keys into Keybox. Keybox is locally stored in device, without uploading to any server. Password Cannot Be Reset For account safety concern, every Account Key is encrypted and stored locally, with no data uploaded to any server. Therefore, your password cannot be reset. You can go back to the former page and try again, or create a new account. Create Account Account Created Go Back and Try Again
REMARK Clear Contact Details Clear Clear this display profile for %s Display Alias Display Avatar Tap to Set Display avatar and display alias will be shown instead of the original ones. Clear the display Avatar for %s
Forced Log Out The device shown below has successfully logged into this account. If it is not you, your Account Key and password may be leaked. Destroy Account Please be noted that everything in your account, including your contacts, profiles, settings, and digital assets in your wallet, will be destroyed, and this action can NOT be undone. I am aware of the consequences and I agree with the legal terms. UNKNOWN "%s" Command Sent Account destroyed success Enter Password Account Destroyed This account has been destroyed, you can no longer log in. Understood This account has been destroyed, you are now forced to log out. Your account login status has expired, please re-login Account Destroyed
Settings NOTIFICATIONS BCM checked the notification is disabled. Would you like to enable the notification? Notifications LANGUAGE Language TTS Language The language of TTS (Text to Speech) is used for magnified messages Please manually open the TTS Settings and change the TTS language. BLOCKED Blocked Users Block Strangers\' Msgs Set failed DATA AND STORAGE Calculating… Clear Cache SECURITY PIN Lock On Off PRIVACY ENHANCEMENT Always Relay Calls Relay all calls through a BCM server to avoid revealing your IP address to your contact. Call quality will be reduced. CONNECTIVITY AirChat Chat without the Internet. Proxy The proxies added will be automatically activated when BCM service is blocked. OTHERS Feedback About FAQ

Back up Account Key (2 ways):\n• Scan using Keybox (BCM) on another device.\n• Copy and paste as an image.\n \nSwitch device:\n• Scanned by and login to another device. Scan Prevent all screen capture operations of BCM. This will hide the contents of you chats or chat list from the task switcher, but you will not be able to take screenshots on BCM.\n\nYou may need to restart the app for this take effect. Prevent Screenshots
